duties_responsibilities.duty: Engage with business partners on processes under the direction of director
Assist in completion of daily general ledger account reconciliation activities and end-user-computing review
Assist in the execution of reporting and analysis performed by the team
Advance various preventative risk activities and initiatives with moderate supervision
Assist director in management and escalation of activities impacting reconciliation processes performed by the team

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Accounting, Finance, or related field (Master's preferred)
